properties.label: Webhook type
properties.hint: Select the HTTP method and payload data type used by webhook. Learn more
properties.name: webhook_type

properties.label: Payload schema
properties.empty_schema_title: Describe all fields in your response.
properties.name: payload_schema

properties.label: Subscription ID
properties.hint: A unique and immutable identifier for the subscription. If not provided, it is autogenerated.
properties.name: id

properties.label: Plan ID
properties.hint: Identifier of the plan for this subscription.
properties.name: plan_id

properties.label: Plan quantity
properties.hint: Plan quantity for this subscription.
properties.name: plan_quantity

properties.label: Plan unit price
properties.hint: Amount that will override the Plans default price.
properties.name: plan_unit_price

properties.label: Setup fee
properties.hint: Amount that will override the default setup fee.
properties.name: setup_fee

properties.label: Start date
properties.hint: The date/time at which the subscription is to start or has started. If not provided, the subscription starts immediately. If set to a value in the past then that date/time should not be more than a plan billing period into the past.
properties.name: start_date

properties.label: Trial end
properties.hint: The time at which the trial ends for this subscription. Can be specified to override the default trial period.If '0' is passed, the subscription will be activated immediately.
properties.name: trial_end

properties.label: Purchase order number
properties.hint: Purchase order number for this subscription.
properties.name: po_number
coupon_ids
properties.label: Coupon IDs
properties.hint: List of coupons to be applied to this subscription. You can provide coupon ids or coupon codes.

properties.label: Billing cycles
properties.hint: Number of cycles(plan interval) this subscription should be charged. After the billing cycles exhausted, the subscription will be cancelled.
properties.name: billing_cycles

properties.label: Auto collection
properties.hint: Defines whether payments need to be collected automatically for this subscription. Overrides customer's auto-collection property.

toggle_field.name: auto_collection
toggle_field.label: Auto collection
toggle_field.hint: Defines whether payments need to be collected automatically for this subscription. Overrides customers auto-collection property. Allowed values are 'on', 'off'

properties.name: auto_collection

properties.label: Terms to charge
properties.hint: The number of subscription billing cycles (including the first one) to invoice in advance.
properties.name: terms_to_charge

properties.label: Billing alignment mode
properties.hint: Override the billing alignment mode for Calendar Billing. Only applicable when using Calendar Billing. The default value is that which has been configured for the site.

toggle_field.name: billing_alignment_mode
toggle_field.label: Billing alignment mode
toggle_field.hint: Override the billing alignment mode for Calendar Billing. Only applicable when using Calendar Billing. The default value is that which has been configured for the site.Allowed values are 'immediate', 'delayed'

properties.name: billing_alignment_mode
mandatory_addons_to_remove
properties.label: Mandatory addons to remove
properties.hint: List of addons IDs that are mandatory to the plan and has to be removed from the subscription.

properties.label: Contract term billing cycle on renewal
properties.hint: Number of billing cycles the new contract term should run for, on contract renewal. The default value is the same as billing_cycles or a custom value depending on the site configuration.
properties.name: contract_term_billing_cycle_on_renewal

properties.label: Payment source ID
properties.hint: ID of the payment source to be attached to this subscription.
properties.name: payment_source_id

properties.label: Override relationship
properties.hint: If true, ignores the hierarchy relationship and uses customer as payment and invoice owner.

toggle_field.name: override_relationship
toggle_field.label: Override relationship
toggle_field.hint: If true, ignores the hierarchy relationship and uses customer as payment and invoice owner. Allowed values are: true, false.

properties.name: override_relationship

properties.label: Invoice immediately
properties.hint: If there are charges raised immediately for the subscription, this parameter specifies whether those charges are to be invoiced immediately or added to unbilled charges. The default value is as per the site settings.

toggle_field.name: invoice_immediately
toggle_field.label: Invoice immediately
toggle_field.hint: If there are charges raised immediately for the subscription, this parameter specifies whether those charges are to be invoiced immediately or added to unbilled charges. The default value is as per the site settings. Allowed values are: true, false.

properties.name: invoice_immediately

properties.label: Plan quantity in decimal
properties.hint: The decimal representation of the quantity of the plan purchased. Can be provided for quantity-based plans and only when multi-decimal pricing is enabled.
properties.name: plan_quantity_in_decimal

properties.label: Plan unit price in decimal
properties.hint: When price overriding is enabled for the site, the price or per-unit price of the plan can be set here. The value set for the plan is used by default. Provide the value as a decimal string in major units of the currency. Can be provided only when multi-decimal pricing is   enabled.
properties.name: plan_unit_price_in_decimal

properties.label: Offline payment method
properties.hint: The preferred offline payment method for the subscription.

toggle_field.name: offline_payment_method
toggle_field.label: Offline payment method
toggle_field.hint: The preferred offline payment method for the subscription.Allowed values are 'cash', 'check', 'bank_transfer', 'ach_credit', 'sepa_credit'

properties.name: offline_payment_method

properties.label: Invoice notes
properties.hint: Notes to be added to any invoice for this subscription.
properties.name: invoice_notes

properties.label: Free period unit
properties.hint: The unit of time in multiples of which the free_period parameter is expressed. The value must be equal to or lower than the period_unit attribute of the plan chosen.

toggle_field.name: free_period_unit
toggle_field.label: Free period unit
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are 'day', 'week', 'month', 'year'

properties.name: free_period_unit

toggle_field.name: create_pending_invoices
toggle_field.label: Create pending invoices
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

toggle_field.name: auto_close_invoices
toggle_field.label: Auto close invoices
toggle_field.hint: Accepted values are true or false

toggle_field.name: on_event
toggle_field.label: On event
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are 'subscription_creation', 'subscription_trial_start', 'plan_activation', 'subscription_activation', 'contract_termination'

toggle_field.name: charge_once
toggle_field.label: Charge once
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are: true, false.

toggle_field.name: charge_on
toggle_field.label: Charge on
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are 'immediately', 'on_event'

properties.label: State code
properties.hint: The ISO 3166-2 state/province code without the country prefix. Currently supported for USA, Canada and India. For instance, for Arizona (USA), set state_code as AZ (not US-AZ). For Tamil Nadu (India), set as TN (not IN-TN). For British Columbia (Canada), set as BC (not CA-BC).
properties.name: state_code

properties.label: State
properties.hint: The state/province name. Is set by Chargebee automatically for US, Canada and India If state_code is provided.
properties.name: state

properties.label: Country
properties.hint: ISO 3166 alpha-2 country code.
properties.name: country

properties.label: Validation status

toggle_field.name: validation_status
toggle_field.label: Customer type
toggle_field.hint: Allowed vaalues are: not_validated, valid, partially_valid, invalid

properties.hint: The address verification status.
properties.name: validation_status

properties.label: Payment intent ID
properties.hint: Payment intent ID generated by Chargebee.js
properties.name: id

properties.label: Gateway account ID
properties.hint: Gateway account used for performing the 3DS flow.
properties.name: gateway_account_id

properties.label: Gateway token
properties.hint: Identifier for 3DS transaction/verification object at the gateway.
properties.name: gw_token

properties.label: Reference ID
properties.hint: Identifier for Braintree permanent token. Applicable when you are using Braintree APIs for completing the 3DS flow.
properties.name: reference_id

properties.label: Additional information
properties.hint: Pass a stringified JSON. For E.g: click <a href='https://apidocs.chargebee.com/docs/api/payment_parameters#payment_intent_additonal_info_sample'>here<a> to see sample json.
properties.name: additional_info

properties.label: Customer ID
properties.hint: Maximum characters 50 characters
properties.name: id

properties.label: First name
properties.hint: Maximum length of the first name is 150 characters
properties.name: first_name

properties.label: Last name
properties.hint: Maximum length of the first name is 150 characters
properties.name: last_name

properties.label: Email
properties.hint: Email of the customer. Configured email notifications will be sent to this email. Maxium length of the email is 70 characters
properties.name: email

properties.label: Phone
properties.hint: Maximum length of the phone is 50 characters
properties.name: phone

properties.label: Company
properties.hint: Name of the company, Maxium length of the company is 250 characters
properties.name: company

properties.label: VAT/ Tax registration number
properties.hint: Maximum length of the VAT/ Tax registration number is 20characters
properties.name: vat_number

properties.label: Auto collection

toggle_field.name: auto_collection
toggle_field.label: Auto collection
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are on, off

properties.hint: Whether payments needs to be collected automatically for this customer.
properties.name: auto_collection

properties.label: Offline payment method

toggle_field.name: offline_payment_method
toggle_field.label: Offline payment method
toggle_field.hint: The preferred offline payment method for the customerE.g. no_preference, cash, check, bank_transfer, ach_credit, sepa_credit

properties.hint: The preferred offline payment method for the customer
properties.name: offline_payment_method

properties.label: Net term days
properties.hint: The number of days within which the customer has to make payment for the invoice. Default value 0
properties.name: net_term_days

properties.label: VAT number validated time
properties.hint: Returns the recent VAT number validation time in UTC
properties.name: vat_number_validated_time

toggle_field.name: vat_number_status
toggle_field.label: VAT number status
toggle_field.hint: This is only applicable if you have configured EU or Australian taxes and the VAT number validation is enabled. For UK, the value is always undetermined. Allowed values: valid, invalid, not_validated, undetermined

properties.label: Allow direct debit

toggle_field.name: allow_direct_debit
toggle_field.label: Allow direct debit
toggle_field.hint: Whether the customer can pay via Direct Debit. Allowed values are true, false

properties.hint: Whether the customer can pay via Direct Debit.
properties.name: allow_direct_debit

properties.label: Is location valid

toggle_field.name: is_location_valid
toggle_field.label: Is location valid
toggle_field.hint: Customer location is validated based on IP address and Card issuing country. If the location is valid, it returns True. If not, it returns False. Applicable only for EU, New Zealand and Australia. Allowed values are true, false

properties.hint: Customer location is validated based on IP address and Card issuing country. If the location is valid, it returns True. If not, it returns False. Applicable only for EU, New Zealand and Australia.
properties.name: is_location_valid

properties.label: Created at
properties.hint: Timestamp indicating when this customer resource is created
properties.name: created_at

properties.label: Created from IP
properties.hint: The IP address of the customer. Used primarily for referral integrations and EU/UK VAT validation.
properties.name: created_from_ip

toggle_field.name: taxability
toggle_field.label: Taxability
toggle_field.hint: Specifies if the customer is liable for tax. Allowed values are: taxable, exempt

properties.label: Entity code

toggle_field.name: entity_code
toggle_field.label: Entity code
toggle_field.hint: The exemption category of the customer, for USA and Canada. Applicable if you use Chargebee's AvaTax for Sales integration. For e.g. Federal government - a, State government - b,...

properties.hint: The exemption category of the customer, for USA and Canada. Applicable if you use Chargebee's AvaTax for Sales integration.
properties.name: entity_code

properties.label: Exempt number
properties.hint: Any string value that will cause the sale to be exempted. Use this if your finance team manually verifies and tracks exemption certificates. Applicable if you use Chargebee's AvaTax for Sales integration
properties.name: exempt_number

properties.label: Resource version
properties.hint: Version number of this resource. Each update of this resource results in incremental change of this number. This attribute will be present only if the resource has been updated after 2016-09-28.
properties.name: resource_version

properties.label: Updated at
properties.hint: This field will be present only if the resource has been updated after 2016-09-28.
properties.name: updated_at

properties.label: Locale
properties.hint: Determines which region-specific language Chargebee uses to communicate with the customer
properties.name: locale

properties.label: Billing date
properties.hint: Minimum value 1, Maximum value 31.
properties.name: billing_date

properties.label: Billing date mode

toggle_field.name: billing_date_mode
toggle_field.label: Billing date mode
toggle_field.hint: Indicates whether this customer's billing_date value is derived as per configurations or its specifically set. Allowed values: using_defaults, manually_set

properties.hint: Indicates whether this customer's billing_date value is derived as per configurations or its specifically set. Allowed values: using_defaults, manually_set
properties.name: billing_date_mode
